structure.unit: SALES OF REALTY OF PERSONS UNDER DISABILITY (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 87,sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 93. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953 from C.C. sec. 491a.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Provisions governing sales and contingent interests -- Reinvestment of proceeds.
